title: How do YouTubers get free products? - Quora

response.answer_text: YouTubers that you see getting free products or hefty discounts on products are what we call influencers. Basically a company, for example NanoLeaf LED lights, sees that this person regularly gets half a million views on each of their videos and they have lets say, 50,000 subscribers, Nanoleaf will give them a set of their awesome lights for free in return for that YouTuber essentially advertising for them. They mention it in their video, add a link in the description and now half a million people have seen Nanoleaf’s product and they have a direct link to purchase. Nanoleaf now makes X amount of sales and the YouTuber gets an awesome set of lights for free. It’s advertising at its core.
A lot of companies will send big YouTubers free things because it makes them look good. It's just another form of advertisement and it's very cheap advertisement.
